name: Draw it! - Physical puzzles
description:
Draw it! - is a fun puzzle game with elements of physics. Draw shapes by going through many clever puzzles. Come up with different solutions for each level.

Simple and intuitive control: just draw a figure (point, circle, line) and it will become a physical body that will interact with level elements according to the real laws of physics.

- Play for free
- Compete with friends
- Train your reaction speed and creativity of thinking

If you like physics, then here you are!
